snippet.title: Zero Sum Heart - Official Release Date Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the release date trailer for Zero Sum Heart, a story-rich visual novel developed by Citreat Studio. Players will make choices and answer the question: is love a zero-sum game? Zero Sum Heart is launching on November 1 for PC with a demo available now.

#ZeroSumHeart #Gaming #IndieHorrorShowcase
